docs.snippet: The number of places where L.G.B.T. travelers can be themselves has grown exponentially and same-sex marriage laws are transforming cities into travel destinations.
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of places where L.G.B.T. travelers can be themselves has grown exponentially and same-sex marriage laws are transforming cities into travel destinations.
docs.abstract: Stephanie Rosenbloom The Getaway column observes that the number of places where lesbian, bisexual and transgendered travelers can be themselves has grown exponentially; notes that same-sex marriage laws are transforming cities into LGBT travel destinations, whether for a family getaway or a romantic weekend.

headline.main: The Evolving World of Gay Travel
